bibl.title: Images of Alexander the Great in the Getty Museum.

bibl.title: Studia Varia from the J. Paul Getty Museum. 2

bibl.seg: GROSSMAN Janet Burnett, Images of Alexander the Great in the Getty Museum.

See p. 57: 4. Acc. 77.AA.3 Portrait head. Marble, H. 28 cm. Alexandria, first-second century A.D.; - 60-61: 6. Acc. 81.AB.66. Alexander as Agathodaimon. Bronze, 12,3 cm. Alexandria, second century A.D.
